descriptionModels.description:
When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of a magical energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 1d10 damage of the type associated with your Gem Ancestry on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.

You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest

When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of a magical energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 2d10 damage of the type associated with your Gem Ancestry on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.

You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest

When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of a magical energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 3d10 damage of the type associated with your Gem Ancestry on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.

You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest

When you take the Attack action, you can replace one of your attacks with an exhalation of a magical energy in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes 4d10 damage of the type associated with your Gem Ancestry on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one.

You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest
You have resistance to the damage type associated with your Gem Ancestry

You can telepathically speak to any creature you can see within 30 feet of you. You donâ€™t need to share a language with the creature, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language.

You can use your bonus action to manifest spectral wings on your body. For a minute, you gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can hover. Once you use this trait, you canâ€™t do so again until you finish a long rest
